description: This is the main entry point for a React-based web application. It imports React, ReactDOM, styling, and the main App component, then renders the App component into the DOM element with id 'root' within a React.StrictMode wrapper.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React elements into the specified DOM node.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the created root.
